narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This was a focused inspection limited to the 2.40 (b)(2) veterinary care item included on the report for the 10/6/15
inspection.  The male Yorkshire Terrier (#108*379*351), "Dexter", had been examined by a veterinarian and a
treatment plan had been developed and was being followed. 
The inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
